column5: I have it on good authority that Garry 2r's is on his way to Arizona, let's hope this trip goes better than last years!
Jeez. I thought you were gonna say he broke an axle or something.  JF
Is he carrying one of the SPOT gps beacons?   those are great fun for your friends.
I know he's got a gps unit, but I don't remember it doing any tricks.  She's got a nice voice though. I think he screws up his turns just so she talks to him more.  JF
It's for the dogs. Buck (the one who lays down about every three feet unless he's on the way to the water) would get frozen to the deck, and Vu would disappear the first time he went out to pee.  JF
I guess a poor excuse is better than no excuse...
